name: Bilaspur
description: Bilaspur is known for its beautiful lake, Gobind Sagar, and the Bhakra Dam. The district offers a perfect blend of water sports, religious sites, and scenic beauty.

locations.name: Gobind Sagar Lake
locations.description: Gobind Sagar Lake is a large reservoir created by the Bhakra Dam. It offers various water sports and is surrounded by scenic hills.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for water activities
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for activities
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Bilaspur
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options available near the lake

locations.name: Bhakra Dam
locations.description: Bhakra Dam is one of the highest gravity dams in India, offering stunning views and educational tours about hydroelectric power generation.

travelTips.bestTime: October to March for pleasant weather
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Bilaspur

locations.name: Naina Devi Temple
locations.description: Naina Devi Temple is a famous temple dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi. It's known for its religious significance and scenic location.

travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Bilaspur
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options available near the temple

locations.name: Kot Dhar
